name: places/ChIJ0elz1zxawokRRQUzMlacr84
formattedAddress: 80 Beekman St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 Beekman St, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
Was super disappointed with my visit today. Went in and waited for an hour to get an ultrasound for my pet. After the machine not working they couldn’t help me and I made an appointment with Bond Vet immediately and she was treated there in 20 minutes. Seaport Animal Hospital did nothing to help my pet or find an answer and I was still charged $120 for simply sitting in the office. Would not recommend coming here if you want them to care more about your pet over making money.

**to your reply**
I was commenting on how she was looked at and not helped. Having to pay for a sick pet visit when nothing is resolved is wrong. I asked if I could go to the sister vet and I was told “only if you go right now they *might* be able” to fit my pet in between appointments. The doctor called and I explained I was disappointed in how this was handled and I was helped somewhere else for less and with care. I don’t appreciate you twisting this whole experience and I would want to know what kind of vet this is. I would never take my pet here. If you actually reviewed our charts you would have seen “he” is a she.

originalText.text: They made me feel like they truly cared. The front staff  assistants and the doctor were all so awesome. My old lady of 14 years went so peacefully. It really put me at ease. I highly recommend them. Thanks from the bottom of my heart ❤️ Glad I chose you. Didn't get to thank doctor herself, but plan to when I pick up my Dogs ashes.

I highly recommend them. Thanks from the bottom of my heart ❤️ Glad I chose you. Didn't get to thank doctor herself, but plan to when I pick up my Dogs ashes.

originalText.text: The most kind and caring veterinarians and staff I’ve ever worked with. My kitty has severe asthma and knowing I have them on my side makes me feel so much better. I switched from another vet, and now I know my baby is in the best hands. Thank you all, especially Dr. L, for all that you do for our family! We appreciate you so much :)

text.text: The most kind and caring veterinarians and staff I’ve ever worked with. My kitty has severe asthma and knowing I have them on my side makes me feel so much better. I switched from another vet, and now I know my baby is in the best hands. Thank you all, especially Dr. L, for all that you do for our family! We appreciate you so much :)

originalText.text: This secret gem is the best veterinary hospital in FiDi. Dr. L is a saint; excellent diagnostician for complex feline problems. If only I could get this level of humane, knowledgeable care for my own human healthcare needs, hah .

text.text: This secret gem is the best veterinary hospital in FiDi. Dr. L is a saint; excellent diagnostician for complex feline problems. If only I could get this level of humane, knowledgeable care for my own human healthcare needs, hah .

originalText.text: After waiting for 50 minutes for someone arrive, outside in the snow, I left. Incredibly unprofessional establishment. My appointment was at 10am, and at 10:50am no one has called or answered my 6 calls. No one showed up to work today. I understand it is snowing, but I should have received a call. While waiting in the snow outside the front door for nearly an hour, my dog injured his foot. Terrible service.
